resources.string: Note: If you have no screen lock, Android refuses to store the settings!
This small helper app creates a Wi-Fi connection entry for the Selfnet Wi-Fi. It configures the correct SSL CA and "subject name match", making it a little more secure than an entry created by hand.
If you face any issues connecting to the Wi-Fi please check whether you typed in your password and email address correctly. If this doesn\'t help contact support@selfnet.de.
Email-address ends with whitespace - please change that

You should now have a Wi-Fi connection entry with the correct security settings and certificate verification. \n\nIf you are facing problems to connect to the Wi-Fi check whether you provided the correct credentials. This message only confirms that the profile has been created, it doesn\'t validate you username and password.
Please provide your Wi-Fi credentials from MySelfnet.
